select SEQ_SAL.nextval as id from dual
insert into T_SALARY(SAL_ID,SAL_EMPID,SAL_SALMONEY,SAL_BONUS,SAL_OVER,SAL_REWARDS,SAL_SOSECUR,SAL_AGGR,SAL_PAYDATE) values (#{id},#{empid},#{salary},#{bonus},#{over},#{rewards},#{socialSecurity},#{aggregate},#{payDate})
mapper.update: update T_SALARY set SAL_EMPID=#{empid},SAL_SALMONEY= #{salMoney},SAL_BONUS=#{bonus},SAL_OVER=#{over},SAL_REWARDS=#{rewards}, SAL_SOSECUR=#{socialSecurity},SAL_AGGR=#{aggregate},SAL_PAYDATE=#{payDate} where SAL_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from T_SALARY where SAL_EMPID=#{empid} and SAL_PAYDATE=#{payDate}
